text: @realDonaldTrump @robertjeffress @VP Follow up tweet in 3 days: Have a good time the next two weeks at home in quarantine. The wonderful Pastor @robertjeffress was exposed to Coronavirus as were you and our GREAT @VP Mike Pence!
